text:
Aww yeah! Let's learn English with
Disney and Pixar's newest hit film, Turning Red.
You know, isn’t it frustrating when natives speak fast like this, and you can’t understand what they are saying?

How would you like to master the principles that will help
you understand natives no matter how fast we speak?
Well you can, and we can help!
Discover the most fun way to understand fast speech with our Free 3-part masterclass with Friends
by clicking here or in the description below now!

Encanto is another recent Disney movie that I absolutely love.
Let's check out a clip from our recent lesson with that one!
